Title: Prohibits disclosure of highway, bridge, tunnel and other thoroughfare toll and transit records, with exceptions
Summary: Prohibits the disclosure of highway, bridge, tunnel and other thoroughfare toll records, and commuter railroad and transit records to protect privacy, unless necessary to perform law enforcement functions of certain public officials and bodies or to further another public entities' official functions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to privacy of electronic fare and toll records
